name: David Ramirez
text: Usually the way people describe directions, they mean a max of about 2 km. Personally I wouldn't say walking distance unless it was max 1 km.     I am willing to walk much longer distances, but that's no longer walking distance--it's either a 'hike' or 'I don't want to pay for a taxi' mode.

source_obj.text: Usually the way people describe directions, they mean a max of about 2 km. Personally I wouldn't say walking distance unless it was max 1 km.     I am willing to walk much longer distances, but that's no longer walking distance--it's either a 'hike' or 'I don't want to pay for a taxi' mode.
